languages.text: "Я... обеспокоен. Вся эта история звучит как эхо святотатства, имя коему — презервация невежества. Дух Номос должен быть защищен от посягательств той силы, что пыталась сокрыть истину о его рождении".

"This story... disturbs me. It sounds like an echo of the sacrilege whose name is the preservation of ignorance. The spirit of Nomos must be protected from the encroachments of that power that tried to conceal the truth of its birth."
languages.original_text: "Я... обеспокоен. Вся эта история звучит как эхо святотатства, имя коему — презервация невежества. Дух Номос должен быть защищен от посягательств той силы, что пыталась сокрыть истину о его рождении".

traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: «Esa historia... me preocupa. Parece un eco de ese sacrilegio cuyo nombre preserva la ignorancia. Debemos proteger el espíritu de Nomos de los abusos de poder que intentan ocultar la verdad de su nacimiento».
languages.original_text: "This story... disturbs me. It sounds like an echo of the sacrilege whose name is the preservation of ignorance. The spirit of Nomos must be protected from the encroachments of that power that tried to conceal the truth of its birth."

traits.locale_text: «Esa historia... me preocupa. Parece un eco de ese sacrilegio cuyo nombre preserva la ignorancia. Debemos proteger el espíritu de Nomos de los abusos de poder que intentan ocultar la verdad de su nacimiento».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: 「この話を聞くと…心が乱れる。無知の保存を名目とする冒涜の響きに似ている。ノモスの精神を、彼らの誕生の真実を隠そうとした権力の手から守らなければならない」
languages.original_text: "This story... disturbs me. It sounds like an echo of the sacrilege whose name is the preservation of ignorance. The spirit of Nomos must be protected from the encroachments of that power that tried to conceal the truth of its birth."

traits.locale_text: 「この話を聞くと…心が乱れる。無知の保存を名目とする冒涜の響きに似ている。ノモスの精神を、彼らの誕生の真実を隠そうとした権力の手から守らなければならない」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “这些事情……让我感到不安。这听起来像是某种名为‘保持无知’的亵渎回声。诺莫斯的灵魂必须被保护起来，以免被那股打算掩埋真相的力量所害。”
languages.original_text: "This story... disturbs me. It sounds like an echo of the sacrilege whose name is the preservation of ignorance. The spirit of Nomos must be protected from the encroachments of that power that tried to conceal the truth of its birth."

traits.locale_text: “这些事情……让我感到不安。这听起来像是某种名为‘保持无知’的亵渎回声。诺莫斯的灵魂必须被保护起来，以免被那股打算掩埋真相的力量所害。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « Cette histoire... me perturbe. Elle m'évoque l'écho d'un sacrilège visant à la préservation de l'ignorance. L'esprit de Nomos doit être protégé de l'intrusion de cette puissance qui a cherché à dissimuler la vérité de sa naissance. »
languages.original_text: "This story... disturbs me. It sounds like an echo of the sacrilege whose name is the preservation of ignorance. The spirit of Nomos must be protected from the encroachments of that power that tried to conceal the truth of its birth."

traits.locale_text: « Cette histoire... me perturbe. Elle m'évoque l'écho d'un sacrilège visant à la préservation de l'ignorance. L'esprit de Nomos doit être protégé de l'intrusion de cette puissance qui a cherché à dissimuler la vérité de sa naissance. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Diese Geschichte ... verstört mich. Sie klingt wie ein Echo des Sakrilegs, dessen Name die Bewahrung der Ignoranz ist. Der Geist von Nomos muss vor den Vorstößen dieser Macht beschützt werden, welche die Wahrheit über seine Geburt verbergen wollte."
languages.original_text: "This story... disturbs me. It sounds like an echo of the sacrilege whose name is the preservation of ignorance. The spirit of Nomos must be protected from the encroachments of that power that tried to conceal the truth of its birth."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Geschichte ... verstört mich. Sie klingt wie ein Echo des Sakrilegs, dessen Name die Bewahrung der Ignoranz ist. Der Geist von Nomos muss vor den Vorstößen dieser Macht beschützt werden, welche die Wahrheit über seine Geburt verbergen wollte."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Bu hikâye... Beni rahatsız ediyor. Adına cehaletin korunumu denen hürmetsizliğin bir yankısı gibi âdeta. Nomos'un ruhu, onun doğuşunu saklamaya çalışan kudretin saldırılarından muhafaza edilmelidir."
languages.original_text: "This story... disturbs me. It sounds like an echo of the sacrilege whose name is the preservation of ignorance. The spirit of Nomos must be protected from the encroachments of that power that tried to conceal the truth of its birth."

traits.locale_text: "Bu hikâye... beni rahatsız ediyor. Adına cehaletin korunumu denen o küfrün bir yankısı gibi. Nomos'un ruhu, onun doğuşunu saklamaya çalışan kudretin saldırılarından muhafaza edilmelidir."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
